snippet: International aid workers trying to contain a fire in Brazzaville before it reaches Shaking continued their work on Monday, a day after explosions killed hundreds.
abstract: International experts seek to prevent a fire from reaching a second arms depot and exploding more munitions in Brazzaville, Republic of Congo; previous day a blaze set off blasts so violent they flattened buildings, killing hundreds and trapping countless others under debris.
lead_paragraph: International aid workers trying to contain a fire in Brazzaville before it reaches Shaking continued their work on Monday, a day after explosions killed hundreds.

headline.seo: In Congo, Hundreds Believed Buried in Blast Debris
headline.main: In Congo, Trying to Check Fire Threatening Second Munitions Depot
headline.print_headline: In Congo, Trying to Check Fire Threatening Second Munitions Depot
